name: Tonari ni Kanojo no Iru Shiawase: I Fight with Summer
summary: Final exams are over and summer vacation is near. The literary club is on the verge of abolition, and its new member, junior Chisa Serizawa, asks me for a training camp at the sea. A one-day beach training camp and a club room training camp that I managed to plan with Katakatsu club expenses.
